mainText: 50 50 1 of South Carolina is organizing a public education rally starting at 11 Saturday May 10 at the State House. This rally coincides with the U S C graduation ceremony at the same time. Plan ahead for scarce parking! Watch the weather, too: thunderstorms are forecast with a high of 67 degrees.
The South Carolina State House rally on Saturday May tenth was attended by the few and the brave. Stay tuned: we'll keep you updated on upcoming actions!
